* Iron Raptor kept her arms around Prowl�s neck despite the fact that she felt him almost lose his balance, not really caring if he fell over�just as long as she was still hugging him.
She couldn�t believe just how relieved she was to see him, letting out a sigh as his arms came around to hold and press her to him.
She received and accepted Prowl�s kiss, relaxing in his arms and looking up at him with more then just relief.
Iron Raptor had felt cold before, first with loose of mech fluid and then from being against an equally cold slab of steel. But now her warmth was slowly returning to her body, Prowl�s own body-heat helping to raise her temperature.
She then looked up and into his optics as he looked down at her and grinned, love and relief in hers as well as in his.
Yet she smiled when she heard his voice again, knowing that she had always loved the sound of it and the comfort it brought.
She sighed again and shook her head at Prowl�s little comment, pressing her lips gently against his before replying. *

�Judging by the way you seem to love me, I�m surprised that you take your eyes off me at all.�
